abstract: American Civil Liberties Union files federal lawsuit alleging that Covington, Ky, school resource officer Kevin Sumner violated Americans With Disabilities Act and constitutional rights of two special needs students by using handcuffs to restrain them.
lead_paragraph: The federal lawsuit seeks to spotlight the use of handcuffs to restrain young children who act out in school.

headline.main: A.C.L.U. Sues Over Handcuffing of Boy, 8, and Girl, 9, in Kentucky School
headline.print_headline: A.C.L.U. Sues Over Handcuffing of Boy, 8, and Girl, 9, in Kentucky School

snippet: The federal lawsuit seeks to spotlight the use of handcuffs to restrain young children who act out in school.
